thread.title: Monday Blues: Reggae band Morgan Heritage to perform at Miss World Kenya gala
thread.title_full: Monday Blues: Reggae band Morgan Heritage to perform at Miss World Kenya gala

title: Monday Blues: Reggae band Morgan Heritage to perform at Miss World Kenya gala
text:
Reggae band Morgan Heritage to perform at Miss World Kenya gala By Steven Kisuli Muendo Monday, Oct 12th 2015 at 11:59 Mojo Morgan and Peetah Morgan perform on stage during the extravaganza 2015 held at KICC Photo: Standard\Edward Kiplimo 
Reggae band Morgan Heritage will perform at the Miss World, Kenya gala to be hosted at Weston Hotel, Nairobi on Friday. 
The deal to have Morgan Heritage at the gala was struck yesterday, MondayBlues can reveal. “He will be the star act during the gala show in which the Kenyan representative for the Miss World 2015 finals will be picked,” Terry Mungai, Ashleys Kenya CEO told MondayBlues. 
Ashleys is the Miss World Kenyan pageant holder. The winner will be picked from the 2014 finalists. Morgan Heritage have been in the country for the last two weeks. SIMILAR STORIES
